    public class ForwardPlanner.PlannerProcess
extends AnytimeProcess
    Planner process, which can be terminated before the end of the horizon

    • Constructor Detail

      • ForwardPlanner.PlannerProcess

        public ForwardPlanner.PlannerProcess(DialogueState initState)
        Creates the planning process. Timeout is set to twice the maximum sampling time.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the planner until the horizon has been reached, or the planner has run out of time. Adds the best action to the dialogue state.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
